name: CostPilot
description: AI-powered cost analysis and prediction for Infrastructure as Code with policy enforcement, drift detection, and SLO monitoring

screenshots.description: Automated PR comments with cost analysis
Critical drift detection with SHA256 checksums

terraform_plan.description: Path to Terraform plan JSON file

mode.description: Analysis mode: estimate, predict, baseline, policy, drift, or all

fail_on_regression.description: Fail build if cost regression detected

fail_on_policy.description: Fail build if policy violations found

features.title: AI-Powered Cost Prediction
features.description: Machine learning models predict future costs based on historical trends and usage patterns

features.title: Policy Enforcement
features.description: Define and enforce cost policies with custom DSL, including budget limits, resource quotas, and tagging requirements

features.title: Drift Detection
features.description: SHA256 checksum-based drift detection identifies manual changes and critical configuration drift

features.title: SLO Monitoring
features.description: Track cost SLOs with burn rate alerts and automated breach detection

features.title: Baseline Tracking
features.description: Automatic regression detection by comparing against established cost baselines

features.title: Exemption Management
features.description: Time-bound exemptions with automatic expiration and CI blocking

features.title: Approval Workflows
features.description: Mandatory approval references for policy violations with audit trail

features.title: Zero Network Mode
features.description: Operate without external dependencies using embedded heuristics

pricing.details: Open source under MIT license. Free for unlimited use.
